channel.title: BentonScape | 2006 Game Frame | Welcome Screen | 100% 474 Prayer | Correct Npc's
channel.description:
Welcome MoparScape
This is my Second post so please nice comments. You might have seen my First post not long ago and if you havent please look at it and compare the differences of then to now
First Post: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=541372.0]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=541372.0[/url]
Ok ive not dont much i must admit as ive not been feeling to great.
Things Ive Done Since V1.0 First Post:
Old 317 Welcome Login Screen. Complete New Side Icons For The Client. [ Still Got 2006 GameFrame :) ] The Real RuneScape Npc's [ All The Proper NPC's Are In The Right Place :) ] Equiptment Stats [ Good Looking One With Correct Stats :) ] Items Kept On Death [ Perfect With Correct Items :) ]
Thats about it, thanks for looking pictures will be below. Please if you can help me Develop BentonScape because its my first ever Server ive coded.
Pictures Of Welcome Screen:
Welcome Screen: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/bdsfvl.jpg[/img] Welcome Screen Recovery Questions: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/hv8ewo.jpg[/img] Welcome Screen Messages: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/35kmpat.jpg[/img] Welcome Screen Bank Pin: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/30my2x3.jpg[/img] Welcome Screen Membership: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/fymhsl.jpg[/img] Welcome Screen Click Here To Play: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/19137p.jpg[/img] Welcome Screen Title Scroll: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/24kz8f4.jpg[/img] Welcome Screen NPC's Head: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/o7ujyt.jpg[/img]
Pictures Of Equiptment Stats And Items Kept On Death:
Equiptment Stats: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/28b9q21.jpg[/img] Items Kept On Death: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/14xkrh0.jpg[/img]
Pictures Of New Side Icons With The Old 2006 GameFrame And New Prayer Menu:
GameFrame And Prayer Menu: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/x4hyma.jpg[/img] New Prayer Menu: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/e7e6uu.jpg[/img]
Dont Flame At Me Please Only Nice Comments And Suggestions, Thank You Email Me: [email]BentonSoft@Hotmail.Co.uk[/email] My First Topic/Post Has More Information.
